body: Well i was playing Venemous TDM and well i found this glitch which this guy was totally abusing and its basically well when you get 10 points you can buy 64 arrows right? so this guys buys about 2 stacks and just bows spams down on our spawn so we cant leave which just ruins the game so if the devs could take away the 64 arrows On venemous TDM from the shop it would be appreciated :)

title: So Can you Patch this please?

replies.body: This isnt a glitch... . The spawn is big enough to get out and it isnt spawn killing cause you spawn with armor.

replies.body: Um 5 points 16 arrows I just tested it.
